scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ../../packages/prisma-client/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate reset --schema ../../packages/prisma-client/schema.prisma --force
